lead_paragraph: In Macomb County, where the term “Reagan Democrats” was coined, voters found in Mr. Trump a candidate who understood the importance of trade and manufacturing.

headline.print_headline: Michigan Voters Say Trump Could See Their Problems ‘Right Off the Bat’
headline.main: Michigan Voters Say Trump Could See Their Problems ‘Right Off the Bat’

snippet: In Macomb County, where the term “Reagan Democrats” was coined, voters found in Mr. Trump a candidate who understood the importance of trade and manufacturing....
abstract: Residents of Michigan, state not won by Republican presidential candidate since 1988, say Donald J Trump appeared most attuned to region's particular challenges, including decline of manufacturing; many voted for Pres Obama, supported Sen Bernie Sanders while he was in race, and have lost faith in government status quo.
